product_short_description: Flagship smartphone with Leica quad-camera system and Kirin 990 chipset.
product_long_description: Capture the world in stunning detail with the Huawei P40 Pro. Featuring a Leica quad-camera system, Kirin 990 chipset, and a sleek design, it's the perfect companion for mobile photography enthusiasts.
product_highlights: 6.58-inch Overflow Display with 90Hz refresh rate for smooth visuals
Leica quad-camera system with 50MP main sensor, 40MP ultra-wide, 12MP periscope telephoto, and 3D depth-sensing cameras
Kirin 990 5G chipset for powerful and efficient performance
Up to 512GB of expandable storage via NM (Nano Memory) card
4200mAh battery with 40W wired and 27W wireless SuperCharge
EMUI 10.1 based on Android 10 for a feature-rich user experience

product_short_description: Ultra-slim laptop with 3K touchscreen, NVIDIA GeForce MX250 GPU, and Dolby Atmos sound.
product_long_description: Experience performance and portability with the Huawei MateBook X Pro. Featuring a 3K touchscreen, dedicated GPU, and immersive audio, it's designed for professionals and creatives on the go.
product_highlights: 13.9-inch 3K LTPS touchscreen with 91% screen-to-body ratio
10th Gen Intel Core i5 or i7 processor for seamless multitasking
NVIDIA GeForce MX250 GPU for enhanced graphics performance
16GB RAM and up to 1TB PCIe SSD for fast and efficient storage
Pop-up webcam hidden in the keyboard for privacy protection
14-hour battery life and fast charging support for all-day productivity

product_short_description: Stylish smartwatch with 1.43-inch AMOLED display, SpO2 monitoring, and two-week battery life.
product_long_description: Stay connected and prioritize your health with the Huawei Watch GT 3. Featuring a vibrant AMOLED display, comprehensive health tracking, and long battery life, it's a versatile smartwatch for active lifestyles.
product_highlights: 1.43-inch AMOLED display with 466 x 466 pixels resolution
Real-time heart rate monitoring and sleep tracking for health insights
SpO2 monitoring for blood oxygen level measurements
HUAWEI TruSeen 4.0+ for accurate fitness and exercise tracking
Up to 100 workout modes for versatile fitness routines
Two-week battery life and fast charging for minimal downtime

product_short_description: High-performance tablet with 10.8-inch 2K display, M-Pencil support, and Kirin 990 chipset.
product_long_description: Unleash your creativity and productivity with the Huawei MatePad Pro. Featuring a stunning 2K display, M-Pencil support, and powerful internals, it's an ideal tablet for work, entertainment, and creativity.
product_highlights: 10.8-inch 2K display with DCI-P3 wide color gamut for vivid visuals
Kirin 990 chipset for smooth multitasking and efficient performance
M-Pencil support with 4096 levels of pressure sensitivity
HarmonyOS for seamless multitasking and cross-device collaboration
Quad-speaker system tuned by Harman Kardon for immersive audio
7250mAh battery with 40W wired and 27W wireless charging

product_short_description: True wireless earbuds with intelligent dynamic ANC, dual connection, and studio-quality sound.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in high-quality audio with the Huawei FreeBuds Pro. Featuring intelligent dynamic ANC, dual connection, and a comfortable fit, they deliver an exceptional listening experience for music and calls.
product_highlights: Intelligent dynamic Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound
Dual connection with seamless switching between devices
Studio-quality sound with 11mm dynamic drivers
Touch-sensitive controls for easy playback and call management
Awareness mode for staying aware of your surroundings
Up to 30 hours of playback with the charging case

product_short_description: Sleek and powerful laptop with 2K FullView display, AMD Ryzen 5 or 7 processor, and slim design.
product_long_description: Elevate your computing experience with the Huawei MateBook 14. Featuring a 2K FullView display, AMD Ryzen processor options, and a slim, lightweight design, it's a versatile laptop for work and entertainment.
product_highlights: 14-inch 2K FullView display with slim bezels for an immersive visual experience
AMD Ryzen 5 or Ryzen 7 processor options for powerful performance
16GB RAM and up to 512GB PCIe SSD for efficient multitasking
HUAWEI Shark Fin Fans 2.0 for effective cooling during intensive tasks
56Wh battery with fast charging for all-day productivity
Compact and lightweight design for on-the-go use

product_short_description: Premium smart speaker with Hi-Res audio, Devialet dual-subwoofer design, and smart connectivity.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in high-fidelity sound with the Huawei Sound X. Featuring a Devialet dual-subwoofer design, Hi-Res audio support, and smart connectivity, it's a premium addition to any home audio setup.
product_highlights: Devialet dual-subwoofer design for deep and powerful bass
Hi-Res audio certification for studio-quality sound reproduction
Smart connectivity with Huawei Share for seamless device pairing
Touch-sensitive controls for easy playback and volume adjustment
360-degree surround sound for an immersive audio experience
Compatible with Huawei AI Life app for advanced audio settings

product_short_description: Stylish smartphone with 6.72-inch curved OLED display, 64MP quad-camera, and 120Hz refresh rate.
product_long_description: Experience style and performance with the Huawei Nova 8 Pro. Featuring a curved OLED display, versatile quad-camera system, and a smooth 120Hz refresh rate, it's a smartphone that stands out in both design and capabilities.
product_highlights: 6.72-inch curved OLED display with 2676 x 1236 pixels resolution
64MP quad-camera system with SuperZoom and Super Night Mode
Kirin 985 5G chipset for fast and efficient performance
Dual selfie cameras (32MP + 16MP) for stunning selfies
120Hz refresh rate for smooth visuals and responsive touch
66W Huawei SuperCharge for quick and efficient battery charging

product_short_description: Sleek desktop computer with AMD Ryzen 7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 GPU, and compact design.
product_long_description: Power up your productivity with the Huawei MateStation X. Featuring an AMD Ryzen 7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 GPU, and a sleek, compact design, it's a stylish addition to any workspace.
product_highlights: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H processor for powerful multitasking and content creation
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 GPU for smooth graphics performance
16GB RAM and 512GB PCIe SSD for fast and efficient storage
Compact design with wireless charging pad for a clutter-free workspace
Multiple USB-C ports for versatile connectivity options
Pop-up webcam for privacy and convenience
